content: with this pattern you can create your own set of formula one tires to complete your grand prix-watching experience the pattern is beginner-friendly and only requires knowledge of basic stitches such as chain single_crochet and slip_stitch the special stitch invisible slip_stitch is explained in the pattern this project is perfect for getting rid of yarn scraps as the stripes on the tire require very little yarn so grab your 3 5mm hook and your dk cotton yarn and get to crocheting these formula one tire coasters for yourself or the f1 fan in your life
